issue.title: [Java] Allow duplicated field names in Java C data interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16672](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16672). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should make Java C ABI allow duplicated field names to align with other languages' implementations.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16672?focusedCommentId=17544955) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13247
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13247>
